original: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko naakusalo
analyzed: bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukaḥ na akusalaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Abyākatamūlaṁ dve.)
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi abyākata mūlam dve

original: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā dve ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
